thread.section_title: Arsenal vs Manchester United date switched to May 7 – Metro
thread.title: Arsenal vs Manchester United date switched to May 7
thread.title_full: Arsenal vs Manchester United date switched to May 7

author: Chris Davie
title: Arsenal vs Manchester United date switched to May 7
text:
Manchester United will now travel to Arsenal on May 7. (Getty Images) Manchester United’s Premier League clash with Arsenal has been moved to Sunday, May 7 at 4pm.
The fixture change may come at a critical time for United as it could fall in between their Europa League semi-final legs, should they progress past Anderlecht next month.
BREAKING: Live PL games on @SkySports in May: 5th #WHUFC v #THFC , 6th #MCFC v #CPFC , 7th #LFC v #SaintsFC & #AFC v #MUFC , 8th #CFC v #Boro 
— Sky Sports News HQ (@SkySportsNewsHQ) March 30, 2017 

More to follow…
